news.title: News Article
news.description: A news article with a title, content, and category.

title.description: The title of the news article.

content.description: The main content of the news article.

category.description: The category of the news article (e.g., Sports, Politics).

summary.description: A short summary of the article.

imageUrl.description: URL for the article's main image.

imageHint.description: A hint for AI image generation.

creatorId.description: The UID of the user who created the article.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the article was created.
